name: Ptarmak
description: Ptarmak is an Austin-based designery of thinkers and doers. We propel brands, lift spirits and wrangle unicorns. We vow to work only on things worth believing in â€“ with people we believe in. Our powers combined, we marry elegance and elbow grease with all our heads, hands and hearts. We are Ptarmak, Uncorporated; a gang of multi-disciplinarians engaged in strategic acts of brandalism.
